'use strict';

/**
 * BaseResult common API of the resultset interface.
 * @module BaseResult
 */

/**
 * @private
 * @alias module:BaseResult
 * @param {Object} state - resultset data
 * @returns {module:BaseResult}
 */
function BaseResult (state) {
    state = Object.assign({ warnings: [] }, state);

    return {
        /**
         * MySQL Warning
         * @typedef {Object} Warning
         * @prop {Number} level Warning level (1 - NOTE, 2 - WARNING, 3 - ERROR)
         * @prop {Number} code Warning code in the server
         * @prop {string} msg Warning message
         */

        /**
         * Retrieve the list of warnings generated on the server.
         * @function
         * @name module:BaseResult#getWarnings
         * @returns {Array.<Warning>} The list of warning objects
         */
        getWarnings () {
            return state.warnings;
        },

        /**
         * Retrieve the number of warnings generated on the server.
         * @function
         * @name module:BaseResult#getWarningsCount
         * @returns {number} The number of warnings.
         */
        getWarningsCount () {
            return state.warnings.length;
        }
    };
}

module.exports = BaseResult;
